availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. Son of James McCubbin and Polly McCubbin. Married to Matilda Gum McCubbin in Green County, Kentucky, in February 1828. Father of James McCubbin, Elijah McCubbin, Cassandra McCubbin, Abraham McCubbin, John P. L. McCubbin, George W. McCubbin, Mary McCubbin, William A. McCubbin, Harriet McCubbin, and Matilda S. McCubbin. Married to Leathy Faulkner McCubbin in Green County on November 2, 1855. Father of Amelia F. McCubbin, Nicholas D. McCubbin, and Marion W. McCubbin. Farmer in Green County in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.
